sql.query: SELECT SEC_STOCK_MKT_WG FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY a WHERE a.DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <= ? AND FUND_CD=? AND SECTOR_CD =?) AND FUND_CD=? AND SECTOR_CD =? at isolation 0
SELECT MKT_RATIO FROM MONTHLY_BM_ANL WHERE DT = (SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <= ? AND FUND_CD=? AND SECTOR_CD =?) AND BM_CD =? at isolation 0

SELECT AVG(SEC_STOCK_MKT_WG), B.CLASS_CD FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY A, FUND_CLASS B WHERE A.FUND_CD=B.FUND_CD AND DT=(SELECT MAX(DT) FROM MONTHLY_FUND_STK_INDUSTRY WHERE DT <=?) AND B.CLASS_CD = ? AND A.SECTOR_CD = ? GROUP BY B.CLASS_CD at isolation 0
